details.overview: Record your animal feed activities with your local council and Veterinary Medicines Directorate's Animal Medicines Inspectorate
details.more_information:
This tool uses [Government Gateway](/government-gateway "Government Gateway"). 

##Getting help
Contact the Farming Advice Service if you have any queries about animal feed registration.

$C
**Farming Advice Service**  
0845 345 1302   
Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm  

$C

##Agents
Sign up as an [agent](https://secure.services.defra.gov.uk/wps/portal/wfa/!ut/p/c5/04_SB8K8xLLM9MSSzPy8xBz9CP0os3gzdx8LQyd_A0t3X3dHA08fM1fvAEdXY3cTI6B8JE55A3dDSnQbmBHQHQ5yLX7b8cmDzAfJG-AAjgb6fh75uan6BbmhEQaZAekAekimGQ!!/dl3/d3/L2dBISEvZ0FBIS9nQSEh/ "Sign up as an agent for Defra farm surveys and assessments"){:rel="external"} if you want to use the animal feed registration tool for more than one farmer.


*[SPR]: Soil Protection Review
*[Defra]: Department for Environmental Food and Rural Affairs
*[SPS]: Single Payment Scheme
details.introduction: Animal Feed Registration is part of [cross compliance.](http://rpa.defra.gov.uk/rpa/index.nsf/UIMenu/814240C66F10CAC8802570C7004248D4?Opendocument "Cross compliance (Rural Payments Agency)"){:rel="external"} You must register animal feed with your local council to get your farming subsidy under the [Single Payment Scheme](/single-payment-scheme-online "Manage your Single Payment Scheme online"). Completing the registration online is quicker, easier and lets you make changes if your circumstances change.
